sentences.english: Fruit trees, large patio area, Walnut school dist.
sentences.chinese: 果樹，庭院面積大，是屬於核桃學區。

sentences.english: Children's Day in New York state is presented every year by this retired elementary school teacher of the Syracuse City School District.
sentences.chinese: 紐約州的兒童節每年由雪城學區的小學退休老師舉辦。

sentences.english: Forbes' rankings are skewed toward counties with good school districts.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯的排名傾向於那些具有好學區的郡縣。

sentences.english: The school district cited more than 400 parents this school year.
sentences.chinese: 在這個學年裏，學區傳喚了400多名學生家長。

sentences.english: Head on over to Beaverton School District, in the suburbs of Portland.
sentences.chinese: 看一下在波特蘭郊區的比佛頓學區。

sentences.english: A 2school district in Wisconsin recently decided to support this position.
sentences.chinese: 威斯康辛州有一個學區最近決定支持這個立場。

sentences.english: California school district is using GPS devices to keep tabs on students with a history of cutting class.
sentences.chinese: 加州某學區目前使用GPS監控那些有逃課史的學生。

sentences.english: Some districts allow homeschoolers to attend school part-time and participate in music or sports programs.
sentences.chinese: 一些學區允許孩子參加學校旁聽或音樂和體育課程。

sentences.english: School districts have made several attempts at decentralizing.
sentences.chinese: 很多學區已經開始嘗試分權。

sentences.english: Afterwards, I continued on in the Lakota school district through my junior high school years.
sentences.chinese: 後來，我是在拉科達學區的中學讀的七年級和八年級。

sentences.english: With the central school-board disbanded[1], the mayor got to work.
sentences.chinese: 學區教育委員會的解散，彭博的改革也開始了。

sentences.english: The Binjiang Campus of the International College is located in Binjiang Higher Education Park, close to the banks of the Qiantangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 國際學院濱江學區座落在錢塘江畔的濱江高教園。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
